job_tasks.justification: The core role described is a back-end developer, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen bouwen we aan de nieuwe generatie onderzoeksmogelijkheden voor advocaten en fiscalisten
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates building a product or system, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI is de juridische sector snel aan het veranderen.
job_tasks.justification: Mentions Generative AI, which is a modeling technique.

job_tasks.phrase: Het eerste AI product in Nederland dat juridische en fiscale vraagstukken betrouwbaar kan beantwoorden.
job_tasks.justification: Refers to an AI product capable of answering questions, implying underlying AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: het systeem beter te integreren in het dagelijkse werkproces van de gebruiker
job_tasks.justification: Integrating a system into user workflows is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: experimenten om het product te verbeteren met machine learning modellen (zowel open-source als GPT)
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions improving a product with machine learning models, which is core to modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: continue verbeteringen aan onze codebase door te voeren
job_tasks.justification: Improving codebase is a fundamental software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: het mogelijk maken om interne documenten van onze klanten te gebruiken
job_tasks.justification: Enabling the use of documents implies building functionality within a software system.

job_tasks.phrase: een case-builder helpen op te zetten
job_tasks.justification: Setting up a 'case-builder' suggests developing a software tool or feature.

soft_skills.phrase: ons energieke en innovatieve team komt versterken
krijg je de mogelijkheid om je AI kennis te vergroten

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on a back-end developer role with an interest in AI, rather than specializing in AI development. While generative AI and machine learning models are mentioned, the core tasks involve traditional software development like codebase improvements and integrating systems. The emphasis is on using AI as a feature within a product rather than building advanced AI models or systems.
